abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences unveils new guidelines that represent radical changes to voting requirements; new diversity-oriented rules may cost many members their Oscar voting rights.
lead_paragraph: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences late Monday disclosed guidelines meant to settle at least some questions surrounding new diversity-oriented rules.

headline.main: Film Academy Gives Guidance on Oscar Voting Rights
headline.print_headline: Details Given on Who Is In, Who Is Out at Academy

snippet: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences late Monday disclosed guidelines meant to settle at least some questions surrounding new diversity-oriented rules.

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
